title: Fix to chip hacking threat creates new worries
text:
Fix to chip hacking threat creates new worries 1:52am IST - 01:53 
Some businesses are holding off on installing the fix for a massive security bug in microchips exposing nearly every computer and smartphone to hacking, fearing the solution is worse than the problem.   
Some businesses are holding off on installing the fix for a massive security bug in microchips exposing nearly every computer and smartphone to hacking, fearing the solution is worse than the problem.  //in.reuters.com/video/2018/01/06/fix-to-chip-hacking-threat-creates-new-w?videoId=379510857&videoChannel=105
